label: clinical_signal_03_dx_renal_biomarker_study_015
content:
## 2024-06-10 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment

- Active: 77
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 28
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 9

#### By Cohort
- 10mg: 20
- 25mg: 21
- 50mg: 22
- 100mg: 23

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: RB-AE-1523, Description: muscle cramp, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 25mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-1583, Description: back pain, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 50mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-1567, Description: urinary tract infection, Grade: 1, Relatedness: not related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 50mg

### Protocol Deviations
- None

### Events
- Drug supply reconciliation completed at 36 sites
- Bioanalytical lab shipment: 58 frozen urine aliquots dispatched
- Renal ultrasound images uploaded to central imaging core

### Notes
- Week 15: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 86 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
